name: Vanilla Minecraft
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Minecraft Java Edition server. Vanilla Minecraft server jarfile.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft to download. Leave at latest to always get the newest version.

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The maximum amount of memory to allow for the Minecraft server to use.

variables.name: EULA
variables.description: Do you agree to the Minecraft EULA?

variables.name: Maximum Players
variables.description: The maximum amount of players that can join the server at one time.

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port to bind the server to.

variables.name: MOTD
variables.description: This is the message that is displayed in the server list of the client, below the name.

variables.name: Allow Flight
variables.description: Allows users to use flight on your server while in Survival mode, if they have a mod that provides flight installed.

variables.name: Allow Nether
variables.description: Allows players to travel to the Nether.

variables.name: View Distance
variables.description: Sets the amount of world data the server sends the client, measured in chunks in each direction of the player (radius, not diameter).

variables.name: Seed
variables.description: Add a seed for your world, as for vanilla Minecraft.

variables.name: Force Gamemode
variables.description: Forces players to join in the default game mode.

variables.name: Hardcore
variables.description: If set to true, server difficulty is ignored and set to hard and players are set to spectator mode if they die.

variables.name: Whitelist
variables.description: Enables a whitelist on the server.

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: A password to use for RCON connections.
